name: Limbo Letters
description:
Where do letters go when there's no one to receive and no one to return to? I don't know. But what if they ended up in a storeroom, unopened in a state of limbo. Lost to the involved parties, found by you.

Built for Windows Game uses Keyboard (WASD and prompts) and Mouse. For intended experience play 1920x1080p

This was my entry for Global Games Jam 2021 - Theme: Lost and Found
